author: Rosie
name: Wordle
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the Wordle cog!
Use `[p]help Wordle` to get the list of commands and their descriptions. If you want to help translate, visit [crowdin](<https://crowdin.com/project/YourProject>)
If you enjoy this cog, consider [donating](<https://your-donation-link>)

Enjoy playing Wordle in your Discord server!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user preferences for Wordle games, including word length, number of tries, colorblind mode, and hard mode settings. It also stores game statistics and leaderboard data.
short: Play Wordle in your Discord server
description: A cog that allows users to play Wordle in Discord. Features customizable settings, statistics, and a leaderboard.
